entry.Diamond: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.
entry.Pearl: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
entry.Platinum: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please VESPIQUEN.
entry.HeartGoldSoulSilver: At night, COMBEE sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
entry.BlackWhite: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
entry.Black 2White 2: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
entry.XOmega Ruby: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
entry.YAlpha Sapphire: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

DiamondPearlPlatinum: Route 205, 206, 207, 208, 209, 210, 211, 212, 213, 214, 215, 218, 221, 222, Eterna Forest, Floaroma Meadow, Fuego Ironworks, Valley Windworks
HeartGoldSoulSilver: Route 5, 6, 7, 8, 11, 16, 25, Celadon City, Cerulean City, National Park, Vermilion City
